feed.title: Category: SoftwareDevelopment | Freelance .NET Web Developer in Mumbai

entry.title: Podcast Episode # 2 : Web Basics
entry.content:
Web Basics that every Student & Web Developer should know.

As a student and a web developer we usually browse the web all the time. But do we really know how the Web works under the hood or what are the pieces of technology that makes the web so easy to use and consume the oceanic information from it.

entry.title: Podcast Episode # 1 : Computer Institutes in India
entry.content:
The Ugly Truth: Computer Institutes fooling innocent parents & students in India.

Are you a parent or a student who is frustrated by computer institutes fooling you in the name of job assistance and useless certificates that they provide?

entry.title: India's First Software Development Podcast Show Launched
entry.content:
Welcome to my brand-new podcast show http://www.softwaredevelopmentpodcast.in/. I am sure that each podcast will give you enormous value addition that will help you to take your life to the next level. You can learn and grow on the go. The purpose is to help you in your journey to success.

India’s First Software Development Podcast Show Launched

Cheers,

Abhishek Luv
